flavorText: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

foreignData.flavorText: „Das Unvorstellbare ist geschehen, meine Schüler. Ich habe keine Zweifel, dass ihr der Situation gewachsen seid."
foreignData.name: Bewunderter Lehrer
foreignData.text: Wenn der Bewunderte Lehrer ins Spiel kommt, lege auf jede Kreatur mit Stufe aufsteigen, die du kontrollierst, zwei Stufenmarken.

foreignData.flavorText: "Lo impensable se aproxima, estudiantes. No tengo duda de que estarán a la altura de las circunstancias."
foreignData.name: Maestro venerado
foreignData.text: Cuando el Maestro venerado entre al campo de batalla, pon dos contadores de nivel sobre cada criatura que controles con la habilidad de subir de nivel.

foreignData.flavorText: « L'insondable nous rattrape, mes élèves. Je ne doute pas un instant que vous ferez ma fierté. »
foreignData.name: Professeur vénéré
foreignData.text: Quand le Professeur vénéré arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez deux marqueurs « niveau » sur chaque créature avec la montée de niveau que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: "L'imperscrutabile è alle porte, studenti. Non ho dubbi che vi dimostrerete all'altezza."
foreignData.name: Venerato Insegnante
foreignData.text: Quando il Venerato Insegnante entra nel campo di battaglia, metti due segnalini livello su ogni creatura che controlli con aumentare di livello.

foreignData.flavorText: 「生徒たちよ、底知れぬ事態じゃ。 皆立ち上がってくれると信じておる。」
foreignData.name: 敬慕される教師
foreignData.text: 敬慕される教師が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールするLvアップを持つ各クリーチャーの上にそれぞれLvカウンターを２個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "Alunos, estamos por enfrentar o desconhecido. Estou certo de que vocês saberão dar o melhor de si."
foreignData.name: Professor Venerado
foreignData.text: Quando Professor Venerado entrar no campo de batalha, coloque dois marcadores de nível em cada criatura que você controla com subir de nível.

foreignData.flavorText: «Грядет непостижимое, ученики мои. Я не сомневаюсь, что вы окажетесь на высоте».
foreignData.name: Почитаемый Учитель
foreignData.text: Когда Почитаемый Учитель выходит на поле битвы, положите по два жетона уровня на каждое существо с Повышением уровня под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 「学生们，难以测度之物正朝我们而来。 我相信你们不会错过这良机。」
foreignData.name: 景仰教师
foreignData.text: 当景仰教师进战场时，在每个由你操控、且具升级异能的生物上放置两个等级指示物。

name: Venerated Teacher
originalText: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.

rulings.text: The abilities a leveler grants to itself don’t overwrite any other abilities it may have. In particular, they don’t overwrite the creature’s level up ability; it always has that.

Effects that set a leveler’s power or toughness to a specific value, including the effects from a level symbol’s ability, apply in timestamp order. The timestamp of each level symbol’s ability is the same as the timestamp of the leveler itself, regardless of when the most recent level counter was put on it.

Effects that modify a leveler’s power or toughness, such as the effects of Giant Growth or Glorious Anthem, will apply to it no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for counters that change the creature’s power or toughness (such as +1/+1 counters) and effects that switch its power and toughness.

If another creature becomes a copy of a leveler, all of the leveler’s printed abilities — including those represented by level symbols — are copied. The current characteristics of the leveler, and the number of level counters on it, are not. The abilities, power, and toughness of the copy will be determined based on how many level counters are on the copy.

A creature’s level is based on how many level counters it has on it, not how many times its level up ability has been activated or has resolved. If a leveler gets level counters due to some other effect (such as Clockspinning) or loses level counters for some reason (such as Vampire Hexmage), its level is changed accordingly.

text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.
